description: Physical and environmental protection policy and procedures documentation (PE-1)
List of individuals with authorized physical access to the facility where the system resides
Physical access authorization credentials (ID badges, identification cards, smart cards) issuance records
Physical access list review records for the past 12 months demonstrating at least quarterly reviews
Physical access audit logs for all entry and exit points for the past 12 months
Visitor access records for the past 12 months including names, organizations, dates, entry/departure times, and purpose of visits
Visitor access record review documentation demonstrating at least monthly reviews
Physical access control system documentation including entry/exit points, guards, and physical access control devices
Physical intrusion alarm and surveillance equipment documentation and monitoring records
Physical access monitoring logs and incident response records for suspicious activities
Visitor escort procedures and records demonstrating visitor control within restricted access areas
Physical access device inventory records (keys, combinations, access cards) with annual inventory verification
Key and combination change records demonstrating at least annual changes or changes following security events
Physical access control documentation for system distribution and transmission lines including wiring closets and cable protection
Output device physical access controls documentation (printers, monitors, scanners, copiers)
Power equipment and cabling protection documentation including UPS systems and emergency power capabilities
Emergency shutoff switch locations and protection documentation with labeling and access procedures
Uninterruptible power supply (UPS) specifications and testing records
Alternate power supply documentation demonstrating automatic activation capability for extended power loss
Emergency lighting system documentation and testing records for emergency exits and evacuation routes
Fire detection and suppression system documentation including independent energy source specifications
Fire detection system automatic activation and notification procedures with personnel notification lists
Fire suppression system automatic activation documentation and notification procedures for unstaffed facilities
Environmental controls documentation consistent with ASHRAE Thermal Guidelines for Data Processing Environments including temperature and humidity monitoring records
Environmental monitoring system documentation with alarm and notification capabilities to designated personnel
Water damage protection documentation including master shutoff valve locations and water detection sensor specifications
Water detection system automated alert mechanisms and notification procedures
System component delivery and removal authorization procedures and records
System component inventory records for all components entering and exiting the facility
Alternate work site policy and approved locations documentation
Alternate work site security controls documentation and effectiveness assessment results
System component location documentation addressing physical and environmental hazards identified during threat assessment
Separation of duties matrix with role assignments for physical access administration and enforcement
Services, ports, and protocols documentation including purpose and authorized users
